appointment.title: Book Your Appointment
appointment.subtitle: Schedule your visit with Dr. Ehab for comprehensive internal medicine care.
appointment.alertMessage: We'll contact you within 24 hours to confirm your appointment and answer any questions.
appointment.reasonPlaceholder: Please describe your symptoms or the reason for your visit...
appointment.medicationsPlaceholder: List any medications you're currently taking...
appointment.consentText: I consent to receive appointment reminders and health information via email and SMS.
appointment.privacyText: I have read and agree to the Privacy Policy and Terms of Service.
appointment.successMessage: Thank you for booking an appointment with Dr. Ehab Clinic. We'll contact you within 24 hours to confirm your appointment details.
appointment.successNote: Please arrive 15 minutes early for your appointment and bring a valid ID and insurance card.

doctorProfile.title: Meet Dr. Ehab
doctorProfile.subtitle: Board-Certified Internal Medicine Physician
doctorProfile.bio: Dr. Ehab is a board-certified internal medicine physician with over 15 years of experience providing comprehensive healthcare for adults. He is dedicated to preventive care, chronic disease management, and building lasting relationships with his patients.

auth.staffPortal: Staff Portal - Sign in to continue
auth.enterCredentials: Enter your credentials to access the clinic portal
auth.needHelp: Need help? Contact IT support at
